ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger
ygData.msgSnippet: I do know for sure it is a Paladin only sword.  Each class will have its own super weapon.  The fiery avenger is the super weapon for paladins. If you don t
ygData.messageBody:
I do know for sure it is a Paladin only sword. Each class will have its
own super weapon. The fiery avenger is the super weapon for paladins.
If you don't believe post on any widely known messageboard about it
being a paladin only sword. As far as the other classes super weapons,
I don't know those. I received the info about all classes having a
super weapon off a lvl 48 group of 5 people. The Oaken scimitar is the
druid's super weapon. The rest remain unknown as far as i know. As for
there being only one fiery avenger per server.. that was heresay and I
am ashamed that i repeated it. Everything else is fact to my
knowledge. BTW.. if you ever wondered where to find Aradune and the
rest of his crew, Veeshan is the developers playground. This doesn't
surprise me seeing as they are the only server to have slain Lady Vox so
far. Talk to some of the high lvl people on your servers. You'll find
out some very interesting stuff.
